channel.title: Bash on sigmonsays
channel.description: Recent content in Bash on sigmonsays

item.title: bash
item.description: I have been a bash hacker since I started with computers. That being said, I probably have some old habits on this page. This page primarily serves as short snippets of bash recipes I often want to re-use. A lot of this bash is old and wrong, because I learned bash so long ago (1998?). Refer to http://mywiki.wooledge.org/BashGuide for proper rules. Simple Logging Redirect Human Size Simple Logging Redirect If you have a bash script you wish to add logging to a simple approach is to use exec and redirect the output to a file.
